ygData.subject: Freeport Quest Attempt
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok here was what we did and the result of our attempt to do the quest starting with the messengers letter from west comm. 1. Gave note to the Guild Master (GM
ygData.messageBody:
Ok here was what we did and the result of our attempt
to do the quest starting with the messengers letter
from west comm.

1. Gave note to the Guild Master (GM from now on).
2. Got the Lady Shea quest.
He doesnt respond to the key words [Bayle List] that
he gives. So either its broken, or they are meant for
someone else.

Ok here is where things get messy.
As we all know when you kill Shea in the Inn she
doesnt drop the note. So while invis, a friend heard
her tell her bodyguard to watch her things while she
goes down stairs. Hmm..does he have the note? Kill his
sorry dwarven butt. No letter. Aww.

Lets try this. Even though she is "threatening" to us,
we are all too high of a level for her to attack us.
So we do what the Pallies are supposed to do. Get her
drunk. Its works..YAY! She tells us about the Qeynos
Guard who took the letter from her. Just so happens i
know where he is. Off to High Pass.
Found him. He doesnt respond to anything we say except
"What is the Bayle List". But he only says that he
doesnt know what we're talking about and tells us to
stop irritating him.
So we kill him. Easy, but the faction hits we take are
bad. Turns out he is a Corrupt guard. Bloodsabers,
Corrupt guards, Commander Kane all drop. BLAH!!

But we get a page (Lore, No Drop). We are assuming
that is the Bayle List. And a rolled up letter which
appears to be written in either code or another
language, because it was all gibberish.

So go back to Freeport to visit the GM. Give him both.
He says "Whatever".

AWWW

Now here are some educated, and maybe some
not-so-educated, guesses.

We believe that we actually need to get all 3(?)
pieces of the Bayle List and turn it in instead of
just the one part that Shea had taken from her.

And we have no idea what the coded letter is for.

Now heres some random questions for anyone out there.

Since we are actually told to kill Shea to get the
List, does anyone know if she spawns anywhere other
than that Inn? Obviously at that point she doesnt have
it, because it was taken from her. So i was wondering
if there was a point where she still has it, maybe in
a different spot, or different time of day, before its
taken. Then we can kill her and get it.

Now if thats a no go, is there a way to get it from
Dayllin without killing him. Thats a whole lot of
faction i dont want to lose (Kane hates me enough as
it is due to all that Trumpy killing i did). Are there
any keywords or mini-quests that anyone knows of that
would get him to cough up his part of the list.
I am willing to kill him to get it, but i would rather
not if i dont have to.

And as far as the rest of the list. I heard thru the
grapevine that anothe piece of it is on a mammoth
somewhere. The 3rd as far as ive heard hasnt been
found. But i havent dug deep into other sites yet.
If anyone has any knowledge of any of these please
feel free to share it :)


Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
